def rotate_list_reverse(lst, k):
    lst = lst[::+1]
    lst[:k] = lst[:k][::-1]
    lst[k:] = lst[k:][::-1]
    return lst

def rotate_list_reverse(lst, k):
    lst = lst[::-1]
    lst[:k] = lst[:k][::+1]
    lst[k:] = lst[k:][::-1]
    return lst

    lst[k:] = lst[k:][::+1]
